distinct
from SCOTT.TB_VIDEO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SCOTT.TB_VIDEO (VIDEOID, VIDEONAME, AUTHOR, IMGURL, FILEURL, FILESIZE, FORMAT, PLAY, COLLECTION, UPTIME, TYPEID, VIDEOLENGTH ) values (#{videoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{videoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{play,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{collection,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{videolength,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update SCOTT.TB_VIDEO
VIDEOID = #{record.videoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VIDEONAME = #{record.videoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMGURL = #{record.imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILEURL = #{record.fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILESIZE = #{record.filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORMAT = #{record.format,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAY = #{record.play,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLLECTION = #{record.collection,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPTIME = #{record.uptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPEID = #{record.typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VIDEOLENGTH = #{record.videolength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SCOTT.TB_VIDEO set VIDEOID = #{record.videoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VIDEONAME = #{record.videoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMGURL = #{record.imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILEURL = #{record.fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE = #{record.filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMAT = #{record.format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAY = #{record.play,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COLLECTION = #{record.collection,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPTIME = #{record.uptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPEID = #{record.typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VIDEOLENGTH = #{record.videolength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SCOTT.TB_VIDEO
VIDEONAME = #{videoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMGURL = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILESIZE = #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORMAT = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAY = #{play,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLLECTION = #{collection,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPTIME = #{uptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VIDEOLENGTH = #{videolength,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where VIDEOID = #{videoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SCOTT.TB_VIDEO set VIDEONAME = #{videoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMGURL = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE = #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMAT = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAY = #{play,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COLLECTION = #{collection,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPTIME = #{uptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VIDEOLENGTH = #{videolength,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where VIDEOID = #{videoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT
FROM SCOTT.TB_VIDEO where typeid=${typeid} and ROWNUM <= 11 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.random)

select
from SCOTT.TB_VIDEO where ROWNUM <= 12 and typeid=${typeid} order by play desc
select t.* from tb_video t where t.play=(select MAX(play) from tb_video where TYPEID=t.TYPEID)
